tutorial: 3. Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Now that we have defined when the strategy should be triggered on, let's consider when the idea should be invalidated.

paragraphs.text: Well... this is a bit of a no-brainer right? We don't want to trade with this strategy when there is no downtrend. So, we'll reverse the logic of the trigger on event!
